scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence includes: a copy of a letter from Kentucky Author Jesse Stuart to L.J. Hortin of Murray (Kentucky) State University, declining to participate in the 1973 writers' workshop; a postcard from writer James Still; a letter from the Army Corps of Engineers concerning the size and depth of Kentucky's man-made Lake Cumberland; from Al Stewart concerning description of betty wood tree; an explanation of income apparently addressed to Social Security administrators; to Mary Stahlman Douglas.
